name: Link Resolution to CMIP7
description: Register a resolution for use in CMIP7
title: Link Resolution to CMIP7:

field_guidance.header:
Resolutions are initially defined in the [WCRP-constants repository](https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/WCRP-constants). You can view existing resolutions at https://wcrp-cmip.github.io/WCRP-constants/resolution/

**If your resolution is not listed below**, you must first [register it in WCRP-constants](https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/WCRP-constants/issues/new?template=resolution.yml) and wait for it to be approved before linking it here.

Once your resolution exists in WCRP-constants, use this form to make it available for use in CMIP7.

---
